overview: None of the Lucas Men on set are left out in this 11-man orgy where everyone is PLOWED, PUMMELED, and POUNDED! Join Rico Marlon, Manuel Skye, Nico Zetta, Marco Antonio, Vlad Stark, Valentin Amour, Pol Prince, Oliver Hunt, Dante Lauro, Michael Lucas, and Ricky Hard as they fuck in a huge guy pile! Later on, Tryp Bates barebacks with Devin Franco and Aaden Stark. And Jeffrey Lloyd pounds Sean Austin in his bubble butt!
title: Plowed, Pounded, Pummeled
